pages.title: Experienced!
pages.text: Here is another feature nobody has asked for! Right-click a frame or illusion block with an experience bottle to give it enchanting power. If this block is near an enchanting table, it will increase its magic capabilities just like bookshelves.

However, the prerequisite for this is that the frame or illusion block has already been "filled" with a block and imitates it. Empty frames have no magic capabilities. This feature is supported by all frame and illusion blocks, $(l)except beds$(). $(l)$(#f00)The Experience Bottle item will be consumed in the action!$()
